name: Using the Playground
description: Learn how the playground works before you start coding.

steps.title: Welcome to the Playground
steps.task: This is where you write and run code. Let's take a quick tour of what's here.

steps.title: Toggle File Panel
steps.task: Show or hide the file panel with this button — or use Ctrl+B from anywhere in the editor.

steps.title: Project Files
steps.task: Your files live here. Click any file to open it in the editor.

steps.title: Code Editor
steps.task: Write your code here. The preview updates instantly as you type.
steps.learn: Write code and see it run live

steps.title: Live Preview
steps.task: Your component renders here in real time. No build step — changes appear as you type.

steps.title: Intro Panel
steps.task: This button opens or closes the getting-started panel. It gives you a quick overview of what the playground offers.

steps.title: Getting Started
steps.task: The intro panel gives you an overview of the playground's features and links to tutorials.
steps.learn: Use the intro panel for orientation

steps.title: Load an Example
steps.task: Click here to browse and load example code snippets.

steps.title: Examples Library
steps.task: Browse ready-made examples for every v0 composable. Click one to load it instantly.

steps.title: Ready to Code
steps.task: That's all there is to it. Load an example from the toolbar or start from scratch.
